text: The Central Muslim Literary Society or The Central Muslim Sahitya Sangsad (In Bengali: কেন্দ্রীয় মুসলিম সাহিত্য সংসদ) is a Bangladeshi old literary organization located at Sylhet in Bangladesh. It was founded on 16 September 1936 by Muhammad Nurul Haque. Syed Mujtaba Ali, Dewan Mohammad Azraf and Dilwar Khan are the former president of this organization.English Wikipedia == References == Category:Organisations based in Bangladesh Category:1936 establishments in Asia Category:Sylhet Division
title: The Central Muslim Sahitya Sangsad
